column5: OverviewThe course is industry-inspired and forward-facing to meet industry needs. You will benefit from a mixture of theoretical input and practice to ensure the relevance of your studies to employability. This means you’ll develop solid business principles, alongside contemporary sector knowledge, and plenty of hands-on experience working in areas related to your field of study. We will encourage you to take a strategic approach to various sectors of the industries. This will enhance your understanding of the ever-changing business, economic and social demands placed on these complex industries.
column7: Attendance  Home Full time, 1 year £11,100 Per year  Part time £1,850 Per 30 credit module  International Full time, 1 year £14,280 Per year
